item.title: Anisotropic Highlight Hair Shader In Unity
item.description: Hair models are commonly used in games, but Unity’s default URP materials did not achieve my desired results for hair shading.

item.title: 80s Hairstyle In Unity
item.description: I crafted a 80s hairstyle using Blender, adopting a common hair creation workflow often associated with ZBrush.
